theLegendOfFinn.view.menu

Class MenuRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • theLegendOfFinn.view.menu.MenuRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameOverRenderer, MapSelectionRenderer, ModeRenderer, PauseRenderer, StartingMenuRenderer

    public abstract class MenuRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
    Parent of all the menu renderers in the game. Manages the menu renderization.
